description: Adds or overwrites one or more tags for the specified directory. Each directory can have a maximum of 50 tags. Each tag consists of a key and optional value. Tag keys must be unique to each resource.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: for the directory to which to add the tag.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be assigned to the directory. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to a directory consisting of a key-value pair. Required name of the tag. The string value can be Unicode characters and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---', --:', --@'(Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$'). The optional value of the tag. The string value can be Unicode characters. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---', --:', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: Required name of the tag. The string value can be Unicode characters and cannot be prefixed with 'aws:'. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---', --:', --@'(Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The optional value of the tag. The string value can be Unicode characters. The string can contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---', --:', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').
